sQuestion: There are 33 pencils and 44 crayons in the drawer . Joan placed 27 pencils in the drawer . How many pencils are now there in total ?

SimplifiedSentences.Sentence: There are 33 pencils in the drawer .
There are 44 crayons in the drawer .
